title: About me
text:
English  Português
Hi, my name is Bruno Mioto, I’m a biologist, currently doing my PhD in Ecology of Inland Water Ecosystems (PEA-UEM) and I study fish phylogeography!
I have experience with data analysis and chart creation, I love to create new R packages and work as a data visualization freelancer!
See my freelance profile here: Upwork
And my portfolio here: Behance
I always seek to bring the right information in a simpler way to society.

title: Sobre mim
text:
English  Português
Oi! Me chamo Bruno Mioto, sou biólogo, atualmente faço doutorado em Ecologia de Ambientes Aquáticos Continentais (PEA-UEM) e estudo filogeografia de peixes!
Tenho experiência com análise de dados e criação de gráficos, amo criar novos pacotes em R e trabalho como freelancer de visualização de dados!
Veja meu perfil de freelas aqui: Upwork
E meu portifólio aqui: Behance
Sempre busco levar a informação correta de forma mais simples à sociedade.

title: R packages
text:
reservatoriosBR downloads data from Brazilian reservoirs from the SAR-ANA and ONS platforms and organizes it into a structure for use in R!
I am currently looking for volunteers to test the functions and data. If you can, get in touch!
If you use it in any work, cite it or let me know! I wonder how this package can help!
We can use this historical data to do analysis and graphing. The Affluence (m³/s), for example, measures the amount of water that arrives at the reservoirs.
You can install it running:

if(!requireNamespace("remotes", quietly = TRUE)){
    install.packages("remotes")
  }
remotes::install_github("brunomioto/reservatoriosBR")

title: R packages
text:
ggimprensa

ggimprensa brings themes from the main Brazilian newspapers for ggplot2.
This package was inspired by the ggthemes package.
The goal of this package is to help users to create more beautiful graphics in an easy and fast way.
You can install it running:

if(!requireNamespace("remotes", quietly = TRUE)){
    install.packages("remotes")
  }
remotes::install_github("brunomioto/ggimprensa")
